ZaExec

Concierge Service for Shannon Airport Transfers, Wild Atlantic Way

Za Exec is a chauffeur and luxury travel company based in Ireland. We specialise in Executive and VIP hire and operate all over the country of Ireland, offering a wide range of services – each guaranteed that you will travel with comfort, security, and professionalism. We ensure that no matter what your travel needs may be – from Airport transfers, Debs events, to funeral transport, to private tours around the country, corporate transport, graduation hire, Wedding hire – we at Za Exec will be able to fulfil it.

We offer a range of vehicles for hire including the Mercedes Benz E class, the Mercedes Benz Viano, and the Mercedes Benz Sprinter (13 and 16 seater).

Our range of on board facilities includes but is not limited to

  • Credit Card facility
  • Wi-Fi facility
  • First Aid Kit
  • Fire Extinguishers
  • Android Phone Charger
  • iPhone Charger
  • Irish Spring Water
  • Newspaper
  • Rain Ponchos

Our drivers are local and knowledgeable of the country and maintain an atmosphere of professionalism and positive attitude at all times. Travel right, with Za Exec.

We remain in constant mobile-phone communication at all times, ensuring that our vehicle will be where you want it, when you want it.

Both our vehicles and drivers are licensed by the Irish Transport Authority, and are also insured as public service vehicles for hire.

Experience

Wedding Services

We have a luxury wedding car service that is available in the Limerick, Clare and Galway areas. Our Mercedes E Class is the perfect car for you to arrive on your special day in style and comfort. Complimentary champagne will be provided as a celebratory toast to your big day. We offer not just one vehicle, but a number of vehicles which would be suitable for transporting a some of your guests or bridesmaids and groomsmen including 2 Mercedes E class vehicles, and two 7-seater Mercedes Viano’s. Get in touch with ZA Exec today to discuss pricing options for our fleet of luxury wedding vehicles.

Corporate Services

We at Za Exec present an excellent service to the corporate sector. Our drivers are all top class and experienced chauffeurs and are available 24/7 all over the country. In the event of a longer journey, our drivers will ensure that there are bottles of water and newspapers on board the vehicle. Our drivers are knowledgeable about the country and will certainly be able to offer suggestions regarding recreational activities to our valued corporate clients.

Tours

If you intend on touring Ireland in style and luxury, Za Exec offers a specialised and individual tour service specifically designed to cater to your needs. Prior to your trip, we will organise a detailed list of all the wonderful sites and attractions that Ireland has to offer. Ireland is a country that is full of beautiful rural villages, gorgeous landscape and magnificent and ancient architecture. While we have pre-existing tours, we intend on working closely with our clients to ensure that you will get the tour of a lifetime that closely reflects what you would like to see and do. Our tours allow you travel Ireland in security and comfort, this is of paramount importance to Za Exec. Using GPS services, comfortable and luxurious cars, and our splendid chauffeurs, we promise to provide a tour that is nothing short of excellent. Be it a site-seeing Day Trip, or a Shopping Outing, plan your tour right with Za Exec.
